message.content: No, the authors do not include the estimated hourly wage paid to participants or the total amount spent on participant compensation. They only mention that they used online platforms similar to Amazon Mechanical Turk and flat payment for some of the studies.

No, the authors do not include the estimated hourly wage paid to participants or the total amount spent on participant compensation. They only mention recruiting respondents through an online platform similar to Amazon Mechanical Turk and using flat payment, but do not provide specific payment details.

No, the authors do not include the estimated hourly wage paid to participants nor the total amount spent on participant compensation. They mention recruiting respondents through an online announcement and from an online platform similar to Amazon Mechanical Turk but do not provide specific compensation details.
